textattack.constraints.semantics package¶

Submodules¶

textattack.constraints.semantics.universal_sentence_encoder module¶

class textattack.constraints.semantics.universal_sentence_encoder.UniversalSentenceEncoder(threshold=0.8, metric='cosine')¶

Bases: textattack.constraints.constraint.Constraint

Constraint using cosine similarity between Universal Sentence Encodings of x and x_adv.

Uses InferSent sentence embeddings.

MODEL_PATH = '/p/qdata/jm8wx/research/text_attacks/RobustNLP/AttackGeneration/infersent-encoder'¶
WORD_EMBEDDING_PATH = '/p/qdata/jm8wx/research/text_attacks/RobustNLP/AttackGeneration/word_embeddings'¶
call_many(x, x_adv_list)¶

Filters x_adv_list to x_adv where C(x,x_adv) is true.

get_infersent_model()¶
score(x, x_adv)¶

Returns the cosine similarity between embeddings of text x and x_adv.
